ingredients.ingredient: 2 ears fresh corn, cut into halves
½ cup seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste

cookingTips: Start with potatoes and sausage as they require longer cooking time before adding delicate seafood
Add crabs last so they cook just until done without becoming tough and overcooked
Season the water generously so flavors penetrate all ingredients during cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This one-pot meal requires layering ingredients by cooking time. How would you sequence the additions to ensure everything finishes simultaneously?
